long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It saves the page as an HTML file. Whenever you open a new page, it is automatically saved into your local drive. If you want to download many links from a page, just right-click the link and open in a new tab, Your HTML content will be saved.
